full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Summary
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada invites sealed bids for the provision of Task Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) to support the maintenance and enhancements of AGPAL, a web-based discovery tool. The contract will be for a base period of one year with an irrevocable option to extend for up to five additional one-year periods.

#### Key Details

* **Reference Number**: 01B68-22-0159
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 17, 2023, at 11:00 AM EST
* **Solicitation Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, etc.
* **Security**: Common PS SRCL #34 applies, Minimum Corporate Security Required: Secret, Minimum Resource Security Required: Secret

#### Description of Work

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires a contractor to supply professional services resources to maintain and enhance AGPAL, a web-based discovery tool. The contractor must have expertise in the following areas:

* WEB development
* Data conversion
* IM Architecture
* Business Transformation
* Project Management

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria

Technical Proposal (50%): Evaluation of the proposal will be based on the following criteria: 

* Experience and qualifications of the contractor
* Methodology and approach
* Timeline and milestones
* Resources required

Price (30%): Evaluation of the price will be based on the following criteria: 

* The bid price
* The rates of the contractor

Non-Compliance/non-responsive bids (10%): Evaluation of non-compliance or non-responsive bids and determination of a bidding being rejected in whole or in part.

#### Submission

Only those TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region will be eligible to bid. Note that "BuyandSell.GC.CA" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or questions regarding this tender, please contact:
Val Judenne
Val.Judenne@agr.gc.ca
Phone: 343-553-9400

The full tender notice can be found [here](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/)
